item.title: Guard at U.S. Embassy in Norway Accused of Spying for Russia and Iran
item.description: The Norwegian man was arrested this week in Oslo and ordered jailed pending further investigation in what the authorities called a â€˜very serious case....

item.title: Russia Supplies Antiaircraft Missiles to North Korea, the South Says
item.description: Pyongyang has long coveted an advanced air-defense system to guard against missiles and war planes from the United States and South Korea.

item.title: Orban Invites Netanyahu to Hungary, Flouting I.C.C. Arrest Warrant
item.description: Hungary, unlike the United States, is a signatory to the court, which accused the Israeli leader of war crimes in Gaza.

item.title: Covid Can Raise the Risk of Heart Problems for Years
item.description: People who had severe infections are especially vulnerable.

item.title: Israel Strikes Across Lebanon After Ordering Evacuations of Southern Towns
item.description: The wide-scale bombardment continued a day after a U.S. envoy held talks with Israeli officials on a possible cease-fire with Hezbollah militants.
